trait.name: Protector's Charge
entries: The bodyguard is dedicated to protecting another creature, known as its charge. If it has no assigned charge when it rolls {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, the DM may choose to assign one from the friendly creatures it can see or hear. When the bodyguard rolls {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, it can change its initiative to be immediately before or after its charge.
Additionally, while within 5 feet of the bodyguard, the charge can use the {@action Dodge|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bodyguard makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr mw, rw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target {@h} 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Guarding Ward
entries: When a creature the bodyguard can see within 5 feet is targeted by an attack or forced to make a Strength or Dextrity saving throw, the bodyguard can force the attack or save to target itself instead.

action.name: Charging Spear
entries: {@atkr mw, rw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target {@h} 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piericng damage.

If the charger moved at least 10 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with this melee attack, the target is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} and takes an additional 1 piercing damage for every 5 feet it moved before the attack.

entries: The charger takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action. Additionally, it ignores {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} until the end of the current turn.

trait.name: Prepared for Action
entries: The commander has a +2 bonus to its {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} rolls.

Additionally, when the commander rolls initiative, it can choose a willing creature it can see within 30 feet. That creature's initiative changes to go immediately after the commander (this does not grant an additional turn if the target has already taken a turn this round).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The commander makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Bark Orders.

action.name: Melee Weapon
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft., one target {@h} 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage.

action.name: Sidearm
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft., one target {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bark Orders
entries: A creature the commander can see within 30 feet, and that can see or hear the commander, can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to either move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks or make a weapon attack.

bonus.name: Tactical Action
entries: The commander takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Help|XPHB} action. If it takes the Help action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, that target can be up to 30 feet away from the commander.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The duelist makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Demand Satisfaction.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft., one target {@h} 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 5}, range 30/120 ft., one target {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Demand Satisfaction
entries: The duelist chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet and that can see or hear it. That creature must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition Taunted|J:General} by the duelist for one minute (save ends). The condition ends early if the duelist attacks another creature, targets another creature with this action or ends its turn more that 60 feet from the target.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the duelist is hit by an attack, it can use a reaction to gain a +2 bonus to its AC against the attack, potentially turning a hit into a miss.

trait.name: Focused Hunter
entries: Being {@condition Prone|XPHB} does not impose disadvantage on the sniper's ranged weapon attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sniper makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Ranged Weapon
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 5}, range 150/600 ft., one target {@h} 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning or piercing damage.

action.name: Sidearm
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft., one_target {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Overwatch
entries: The sniper choses a 20-foot cube centred on a point it can see within 120 feet. Each time a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the sniper can take a Ranged Weapon attack against the creature. The attack does not require a reaction, however, the sniper must be able to see the creature and must not be {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}.
The effects last until the start of the sniper's next turn and end early once it makes three attacks in this way.

bonus.name: Steady Aim
entries: If the sniper has not moved on the current turn it can gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next ranged weapon attack roll it makes before the start of its next turn. On a hit, the attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.
When it uses this bonus action, the sniper's speed is reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Hold the Banner High
entries: The standardbearer grants a {@dice 1d4} bonus to the attack rolls and saving throws of all other creatures of its choice within 15 feet that can see the banner.
The standardbearer does not grant this bonus if it is not holding the banner or is {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The standardbearer makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Bolster Morale.

action.name: Sidearm
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft., one target {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft., one target {@h} 26 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition Hampered|J:General} until the start of the tower's next turn.

action.name: Pole Strike
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft., one_target {@h} 20 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft., one_target {@h} 17 ({@damage 3d4 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Medium or smaller, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} or {@condition Grappled|XPHB}.

reaction.name: Reactive Strike
entries: When a creature enters the tower's reach, it can make a Pole Strike or Unarmed Strike against that creature.

trait.name: Unmovable
entries: The tower has advantage on ability checks and saving throws against being {@condition Grappled|XPHB} or being moved against its will.
In addition, when a creature that has Grappled the tower moves with it, every foot of movement costs an extra 2 feet of movement instead of 1.
